title.rendered: 5-night Queen Victoria Big Band Ball cruise sailing from Southampton with Cunard from only £439pp

content.rendered:
Are you a lover of all things dance and music? Then we’ve found you the ultimate sailing heading to some of Europe’s biggest cities including Bruges, Amsterdam and Cherbourg. Join Cunard on their elegant vessel, Queen Victoria for a night of dancing as this deluxe cruise line hosts their annual Big Band Ball. With a 13-piece orchestra playing Glen Miller, Duke Ellington and Count Basie, get ready to pull out your best Strictly Come Dancing moves. Plus book a cruise of 5 nights or more before 28th November and enjoy a complimentary luxury hamper worth £100, thanks to P&O Cruises’ Black Friday offer.

And when you’re not owning the dancefloor, Queen Victoria has plenty of surprises up her sleeve to keep you fully occupied during your 5-night sailing. Cunard redefines luxury – especially with its White Star Service – which prides itself on the fact staff go above and beyond to deliver the best service at sea. But that’s not all Cunard does well – they also amaze their guests with their impressive culinary creations, as well as offering great choices from Mexican favourites to Asian infused dishes and extensive buffets.

Want to know the details? Then let’s clear things up for you. This fabulous price is based on two people sharing an inside stateroom on a Full Board basis. So no worrying about paying for your meals and entertainment – it’s all included in the price of your fare!

What’s included?

  • 5 nights onboard Queen Victoria, in an inside stateroom
  • Full Board – all meals and onboard entertainment
  • 24-hour room service
  • Transfers to and from the ship

Itinerary

  • Day 1 – Southampton, UK
  • Day 2 – Zeebrugge, Bruges, Belgium
  • Day 3 – Amsterdam, The Netherlands
  • Day 4 – At sea
  • Day 5 – Cherbourg, France
  • Day 6 – Southampton, UK

Itinerary highlights

Cherbourg

When you start exploring, you’ll find that Cherbourg is home to some famous monuments and musuems that are well worth a look – such as Mont St. Michel. This world heritage site has a captivating appearance and position, as the abbey stands elevated on the rocky isle. And if you’ve come here to try the cuisine then this city is well known for its tasty Normandy dishes – roasted scallops, fish dishes and the freshest of fruit.

Amsterdam

A city famed for its quirky cafes, bike-riding locals and beautiful 17th century canals, Amsterdam is flying the flag for the Netherlands. And if you want to get a taste for this bustling city, we suggest you start by sampling its delicious Stroopwafel – two thin waffles containing a caramel filling. Simple but so delicious! The city’s museums are one of the main lures too – with attractions such as Anne Frank’s house and the impressive Van Gogh Museum, you can’t fail to soak up some culture whilst you’re here.

Black Friday Offers from Cunard

For more information on what amazing deals Cunard are offering this Black Friday, click the button below.

Cunard Black Friday Offers

* Terms & Conditions apply

We are acting as an agent on behalf of travel suppliers and your booking will be subject to the supplier’s terms and conditions. Prices may be subject to very limited availability and are correct as at the date and time of writing. Prices may go up or down from time to time. Prices quoted are for the dates, accommodation, board basis, departure points and number of persons sharing specified only and cannot be combined with any other offer. We reserve the right to amend any quotes given if there is a genuine error as soon as we become aware of it. We reserve the right to withdraw any offers without notice.

For full Cunard terms and conditions click here.

title.rendered: Amsterdam
7-night Spain & France cruise with P&O Cruises onboard Britannia sailing from Southampton from only £489pp

content.rendered:
Experience the colours of spring with this amazing Spain and France crossing. Plus book a cruise of 5 nights or more before 28th November and enjoy a complimentary luxury hamper worth £100, thanks to P&O Cruises’ Black Friday offer.

Spend 7 days getting to know Europe’s hidden gems as you immerse yourself in the culture. Besides, with temperatures starting to climb and most places still in low season, this is the perfect time of year to grab a cruise holiday. And what’s more, this is all courtesy of P&O Cruises on their flagship, Britannia. This glamorous vessel epitomises style with its Union Jack Flag exterior and £1,000,000 art collection.

Over 15 decks you’ll find a sports arena, Oasis Spa and the first cookery club at sea. So, if you want to unleash your inner baker – now’s your chance, with James Martin’s very own cookery school. This super cheap price is based on two people sharing an inside cabin on a Full Board basis. That means all of your meals and entertainment is taken care of throughout the duration of your cruise – count us in!

What’s included?

  • 7 nights onboard Britannia, in an inside cabin
  • Full Board – all meals and onboard entertainment

Itinerary

  • Day 1 – Southampton
  • Day 2 – At sea
  • Day 3 – La Coruna
  • Day 4 – Bilbao
  • Day 5 – La Rochelle
  • Day 6 – At sea
  • Day 7 – Cherbourg
  • Day 8 – Southampton

Itinerary highlights

Bilbao

Bilbao may be one of Spain’s lesser-known spots, but you’ll be surprised by how quickly this city draws you in – especially when you get to experience its traditional Basque culture. This urban landscape has everything you would expect from a big city – including boutiques, a colourful Old Town, and plenty of museums. But its biggest appeal has to be its futuristic architecture – in fact, Bilbao is home to Frank Gehry’s Museo Guggenheim, one of the most striking buildings in the world.

La Rochelle

When it comes to first impressions, La Rochelle doesn’t disappoint. As one of France’s most picturesque towns with its surrounding countryside and striking bay, it’s fast becoming a popular destination with visitors from all over the world. One of the biggest attractions is the old harbour, which is known as Vieux Port. Guarded by two Medieval towers, this spot offers magnificent views and is now one of the town’s most photographed spots – so don’t forget your camera!

Additional information

  • For more information on excursions and other optional extras, give our cruise experts a call on 0800 107 1590
  • Free luxury hamper is only redeemable on bookings of 5 nights or more

Black Friday Offers from P&O Cruises

For more information on what amazing deals P&O Cruises are offering this Black Friday, click the button below.

P&O Cruises Black Friday Offers

title.rendered: lib_shu_16_f0616_rf-la-coruna-small
13-night Suez Canal & The Med sailing with Royal Caribbean® onboard Legend of the Seas® from only £859pp – including return flights from London Heathrow

content.rendered:
Is it just us or is it time to book a holiday yet? If you’re looking for something to look forward to to get you through those cold winter months, we’ve found just the deal for you with this amazing cruise. That’s right – your cruise will start in Dubai and end in Barcelona, which means you’ll get to visit more ports in one sailing.

What’s more, during your crossing you’ll get to sail down the famous Suez Canal. Connecting the Mediterranean to the Red Sea, this sea-level waterway is a truly inspiring experience, so make sure you grab your camera and head out on deck.

Legend of the Seas has got you covered for your sea days. This ship is no run-of-the-mill vessel – designed for adventure types, you’ll get to experience everything from rock climbing, to yoga – you can even fit in a quick game of mini-golf. This super offer includes all of your meals in the ship’s main dining rooms as well as all of your onboard entertainment – and from day one, you’ll soon realise what great value this is.

What’s included?

  • 13 nights onboard Legend of the Seas, in a category Z interior stateroom
  • Full Board – all meals and onboard entertainment
  • Return flights from London Heathrow

Itinerary

  • Day 1 – Dubai, United Arab Emirates, depart 8.00pm
  • Day 2 – At sea
  • Day 3 – At sea
  • Day 4 – At sea
  • Day 5 – At sea
  • Day 6 – At sea
  • Day 7 – Suez Canal (Passage), arrive 11.00pm
  • Day 8 – Suez Canal (Passage), depart 3.00pm
  • Day 9 – At sea
  • Day 10 – Athens, Greece, arrive 6.00am, depart 6.00pm
  • Day 11 – At sea
  • Day 12 – Valletta, Malta , arrive 7.00am, depart 6.00pm
  • Day 13 – At sea
  • Day 13 – Barcelona, Spain, depart 6.00am

Itinerary highlights

 Suez Canal

This is no average canal – separating the African continent from Asia and operating since 1869, the Suez Canal is one of the world’s most significant waterways. And don’t worry, there’s plenty to see along the way – especially when you get to the public gardens and beautiful mosques of Port Said. But for many, the biggest highlight is the feeling of cruising through the desert – trust us, this is a truly unforgettable experience.

Athens

Best known for its stunning acropolis rising high above the city, Athens is often described as the historical capital of Europe. So, if you want to see all things antique, head to the Plaka neighbourhood. This is where you’ll find many of the city’s museums, ancient monuments and Byzantine art masterpieces. Don’t forget to try the food too – with plenty of restaurants serving up delicious Greek favourites – there’s no such thing as a bad meal in Athens.

Additional information

Alternative flights are also available, however these will come at a supplement. If you require any more information just give one of our cruise experts a call on 0800 107 1590.

Black Friday Offers from Royal Caribbean

For more information on what amazing deals Royal Caribbean are offering this Black Friday, click the button below.

Royal Caribbean Black Friday Offers

title.rendered: Suez Canal
14 nights, Scandinavia & Russia, Black Friday offer from Celebrity Cruises® onboard Celebrity Eclipse®, 2nd July 2017 from only £1309pp

content.rendered:
Want to get sailing in 2017? Then this is the Black Friday offer for you. Next summer, set sail from Southampton onboard Celebrity Eclipse and head for the delights of Scandinavia & Russia.

Celebrity Cruises know all there is to know about cruising. Founded in 1988 this premium cruise line offers their cruisers so much more – including ultimate relaxation at the Canyon ranch SpaClub, fantastic entertainment from the onboard show team and even a world-class bar which definitely brings high standards to the fine art of drinking…chin chin!

Celebrity Eclipse is award-winning and offers a taste of modern luxury – from activities that include food and wine pairing as well as ‘mixology 101’, you can also stimulate your mind with art tours, language classes and health & well-being activities such as yoga or boot camp. There’s also a whole range of fun games at the Lawn Club for the whole family to enjoy. So don’t delay – call today. Our cruise experts are on hand to speak to you!

Itinerary

  • Day 1 – Southampton, departs 4.00pm
  • Day 2 – Bruges, arrives 7.00am, departs 3.00pm
  • Day 3 – at sea
  • Day 4 – Copenhagen, arrives 7.00am, departs 5.00pm
  • Day 5 – at sea
  • Day 6 – Stockholm, arrives 10.00am, departs 6.00pm
  • Day 7 – Tallinn, arrives 11.00am, departs 7.00pm
  • Day 8 – St. Petersburg, arrives 7.00am – overnight
  • Day 9 – St. Petersburg – overnight
  • Day 10 – St. Petersburg, departs 6.00pm
  • Day 11 – at sea
  • Day 12 – Berlin, Warnemunde, arrives 9.00am, departs 10.00pm
  • Day 13 – at sea
  • Day 14 – at sea
  • Day 15 – Southampton, arrives 6.00am

What’s included?

  • 14 nights onboard Celebrity Eclipse in an inside stateroom
  • Full Board
  • Entertainment
  • Health & well-being activities including the Lawn Club
  • Kids fun factory/XClub and so much more!

Itinerary highlights

Copenhagen

You’ll find a wide range of entertainment, culture and shopping in this super city. Make your way through winding streets, hop on a bike or take a canal tour. You’ll find this laid-back capital an absolute delight. Whether you’re young or young at heart, you will love Tivoli – this beautiful fairground is one of the oldest amusement parks in the world and the gardens are absolutely stunning. It’s a great place to discover your inner child.

St. Petersburg

This is a fantastic opportunity to discover all that St. Petersburg has to offer with two nights in this beautiful port. For those of you seeking culture, get ready to explore the treasure trove that is on offer here. The Hermitage Museum is one of the largest and oldest museums in the world – founded in 1764 by Catherine the Great, it was opened to the public in 1852 and offers an array of artifacts from Egyptian mummies to Picasso paintings. Your Russian adventure will be one to remember with Celebrity Cruises.

Additional information

  • Looking to upgrade? Upgrade to ocean view or above to take advantage of Celebrity Cruises latest campaign for Black Friday – Treat a Loved One & Love Paying Half, plus receive all inclusive drinks and up to $400 onboard spend per booking – but hurry, as this offer ends 30th November 2016!
  • Speak to our cruise experts about enhancing your stay – drinks packages, speciality dining, spa treatments, shore excursions and more. Give us a quick call on 0800 107 1590 for more information.

Black Friday Offers from Celebrity Cruises

For more information on what amazing deals Celebrity Cruises are offering this Black Friday, click the button below.

Celebrity Cruises Black Friday Offers

title.rendered: St. Petersburg
Cities & Waterways of Europe, Fred. Olsen Cruise Lines, Balmoral from only £379pp

content.rendered:
Don’t miss out on this amazing Black Friday deal from Fred. Olsen Cruise Lines. Sail from Dover onboard beautiful Balmoral to the stunning destinations of Germany, the Netherlands and Belgium. If you haven’t sailed with Fred. Olsen before, get ready for the holiday of a lifetime. Balmoral takes her name from the Scottish residence of the Royal Family and you’ll find the theme runs throughout the ship.

Chef’s onboard will tantalise your taste buds with an array of delicacies to ensure no two days are the same. The staff are top notch and will ensure you have the best time – the personal touches really do make all the difference, and before you know it the bartender will be handing you your favourite tipple without you even muttering a word. There’s plenty of bars and lounges for you to relax in before heading to one of the entertainment shows – the cabaret is fantastic.

Take time out to relax in the bubbling Jacuzzi and watch the world go by as you sail away through the North Sea Canal and Western Scheldt River, all before enjoying time in port. This fantastic offer won’t be around for long – so pick up the phone and call CruiseDeals.co.uk today.

What’s included?

  • 8 nights onboard Balmoral in an interior cabin
  • Full Board
  • Captain’s cocktail party and gala buffet
  • Onboard facilities including the swimming pools, Jacuzzis and use of gym equipment
  • Daily onboard activities and lectures

Itinerary

  • Day 1 – Dover
  • Day 2 – at sea
  • Day 3 – Hamburg, Germany – overnight
  • Day 4 – Hamburg, Germany – cruising Elbe River
  • Day 5 – cruising North Sea Canal
  • Day 5 – Amsterdam, Netherlands – overnight
  • Day 6 – Amsterdam, Netherlands
  • Day 7 – cruising Western Scheldt River then on to Antwerp, Belgium – overnight
  • Day 8 – Antwerp, Belgium
  • Day 9 – Dover

Itinerary highlights

Hamburg, Germany

Known as the gateway to the world, an overnight stay in this major city is a big bonus. If you’re looking to shop you’ll be in your element – there’s many stores and malls to choose from, whether you’re shopping on a budget or for luxury brands – there’s so much choice. If you’re looking for culture then you’re in for the ride of your life – with museums and galleries in abundance, you can explore everything from a miniature railway through to fine arts. You’ll have a great time in this beautiful place.

Amsterdam, Netherlands

With such a broad spectrum of attractions and sights you’ll really appreciate another overnight stay in this port. There’s so much more on offer than just windmills, clogs, and tulips – this beautiful city will make you want to return again and again. Visit Dam Square – the heart of the city – which holds a wealth of history including the Royal Palace and the Historical Museum. If you want to get away from the bustling centre, there’s a number of parks as well as the botanical garden, perfect for an oasis of peace.

Additional information

Fred. Olsen offer a range of extras to enhance your cruise. Book your All Inclusive Drinks package, shore tours and even spa treatments before you go, speak to our cruise experts to find out more by calling 0800 107 1590.

Black Friday Offers from Fred. Olsen

For more information on what amazing deals Fred. Olsen are offering this Black Friday, click the button below.

Fred. Olsen Black Friday Offers

title.rendered: hamburg
Black Friday Offers from Princess Cruises

content.rendered:
Kick-off the holiday season with this pre-Christmas Cruise Sale! Princess Cruises have the perfect Black Friday deals for you – make your Christmas list this year all about ‘going places’ rather than just ‘getting things’. Whether you’re looking for a real adventure or a relaxing break away – we have a bucket list of voyages you just can’t refuse. So what are you waiting for? Feast your eyes on these fantastic flash deals!

What you can expect from a Princess Cruise…

On a Princess cruise, you really will feel like royalty. You’re in for a world of wonderful new discoveries – with destination-themed activities depending on your itinerary, you could meet Alaskan lumberjacks, have fun hula-dancing in Hawaii, or even receive street pan drum lessons in the Caribbean.

The new experiences don’t end there though – take an exclusive ‘behind the scenes’ tour of your ship, exploring the engine room, galley and even meeting the captain! Induldge in wine tasting, attend an art or history lecture, or watch a movie under the stars. Take part in one of the hilarious pool competitions – or relax in the hot tub.  There’s plenty of shopping onboard for you shop-a-holics, too.

You’ll have the joy of tasting a variety of cuisine – from local dishes based on your destination, to the most exquisite gourmet dishes from around the globe. Each dish is ‘designed for fresh’ and the restaurants offer a selection to please even the most shrewd of appetites – whether you fancy some posh nosh or a home-cooked meal, you can find it all onboard a Princess cruise.

Black Friday Offers from Princess Cruises

  • Selected sailings prices have been slashed – and the quicker you catch this deal, the better! The first 200 will receive the very cheapest Black Friday offers, with prices starting from £499pp!
  • After these have been snapped up, the next allocation of prices will be released – also at a discounted price.
  • Selected sailings will also receive an additional onboard spend of up to $85

Putting it simply, the more discount you want, the quicker you need to be! Sale starts on Friday 25th and ends Monday 28th November 2016.

Here’s some hand-picked deals we think you’d love…

Black Friday Offers from Royal Caribbean®

content.rendered:
Kick-off the holiday season with this pre-Christmas Cruise Sale! Royal Caribbean have the perfect Black Friday deals for you – make your Christmas list this year all about ‘going places’ rather than just ‘getting things’. Whether you’re looking for a real adventure or a relaxing break away – we have a bucket list of voyages you just can’t refuse. So what are you waiting for? Feast your eyes on these fantastic flash deals!

What you can expect from a Royal Caribbean cruise…

Sailing the Royal Caribbean way is simply an extraordinary experience. With some of the most advanced technology ever to be featured on a cruise ship, Royal Caribbean can offer you activities that include ice skating, bumper cars, waterslides, surfing simulator Flowrider ® and the Rock Wall. Ever wondered what it feels like to skydive? Then try out the amazing RipCord by iFly® – you’ll experience all the exhilaration without ever having to leave the deck. Kids will be in their element.

The dining onboard offers you a variety of delicious cuisine.  There’s so many restaurants to choose from – American, Japanese, Italian – it’s all there, with foodie expert Jamie Oliver even adding to the menu. There’s also numerous bars and lounges to sip a cocktail or two – and if you travel on Anthem of the Seas ® you’ll even be served by robot bartenders in the Bionic Bar – if that’s not amazing, we don’t know what is.

The onboard entertainment is so good you might never want to leave your ship – with West-End shows such as the award-winning ‘We Will Rock You’ and high diving acrobatics at the AquaTheatre, there’s a whole host of performances for you to enjoy. Of course, you can always just lay back and chill in one of the pools or hot tubs instead – whether you’re looking for adventure or relaxation, you can find it all onboard a Royal Caribbean ship.

Black Friday Offers from Royal Caribbean

  • Selected sailings for 2017 available from £439 when you book between 25th – 28th November 2016.
  • Plus, pay a reduced deposit of only £25pp
*please note Royal Caribbean Black Friday offers can not be used in conjunction with the VOOM campaign

title.rendered: black-friday-rci-80
Black Friday Offers from Fred. Olsen Cruise Lines

content.rendered:
Kick-off the holiday season with this pre-Christmas Cruise Sale! Fred. Olsen Cruise Lines have the perfect Black Friday deals for you – make your Christmas list this year all about ‘going places’ rather than just ‘getting things’. Whether you’re looking for a real adventure or a relaxing break away – we have a bucket list of voyages you just can’t refuse. So what are you waiting for? Feast your eyes on these fantastic flash deals!

What you can expect from a Fred. Olsen cruise…

Want to feel relaxed and invigorated? Then a Fred. Olsen Cruise is perfect for you – the personal touches make this cruise liner really special, and before you know it the bartender will be pouring you your favourite tipple without you uttering a single word.

The superb food is another highlight when sailing with Fred. Olsen. The expert chefs produce amazing dishes night after night, with something special on the menu every day. There’s so many options – from vegetarian dishes, healthy choices and even speciality dishes inspired by the cruise lines’ Norwegian heritage. You’re in for a treat!

There’s a fabulous host of acts and activities for you to enjoy – guest speakers, performers, art and craft lessons as well as quizzes, just to name a few. Brush up on a new hobby or learn a new skill such as photography, ballroom dancing, painting, or even a new language – it’s up to you. When the lights go down you can enjoy cabaret, comedy and live music – all whilst sailing between some of the world’s most amazing destinations.

Black Friday Offers from Fred. Olsen Cruise Lines

title.rendered: black-friday-fred-80
Black Friday Offers from P&O Cruises

content.rendered:
Kick-off the holiday season with this pre-Christmas Cruise Sale! P&O Cruises have the perfect Black Friday deals for you – make your Christmas list this year all about ‘going places’ rather than just ‘getting things’. Whether you’re looking for a real adventure or a relaxing break away – we have a bucket list of voyages you just can’t refuse. So what are you waiting for? Feast your eyes on these fantastic flash deals!

What you can expect when you sail with P&O Cruises…

Stepping onto one of P&O Cruises’ fleet, you’ll feel welcomed and inspired immediately. This trusted British cruise line has so many quality services and facilities to offer you. There’s some fab kids clubs and plenty of entertainment for you, too.

From West-End style performances in the theatre to comedy acts, cabaret, live music and quiz shows, there’s always something going on. Catch a film screening in the cinema, take some dance classes or take part in cookery demonstrations. There’s even special Strictly Come Dancing themed cruises, featuring dancers and judges from the hit BBC show. Watch from the audience or dust off your dance shoes and join in yourself!

With an amazing array of appetizing delights available onboard, meal times will be exciting for everyone – the main restaurants offer choice that is second-to-none. Whether you want a light bite or a real feast – it’s all there for you to enjoy. You don’t even have to move from your sun lounger – there are poolside grills so you can enjoy lunch with a view!

Black Friday Offers from P&O Cruises

  • Free luxury hamper worth £100 on all bookings of 5 nights or more

title.rendered: black-friday-poc-80
8-nights Fly & Cruise, Italy and Spain with Royal Caribbean® onboard Brilliance of the Seas® 6th June 2017 from only £779, incl return flights from London Heathrow

content.rendered:
Snap up this brilliant Black Friday offer and get sailing away to the sunny shores of Italy and Spain next June. If you want to be blown away, Brilliance of the Seas will not disappoint – she combines sleek swiftness, panoramic vistas and wide-open spaces to make you feel as though you’ve stepped onboard a whole new world. With a nine-storey central atrium, elevators facing the sea and floor-to-ceiling windows throughout – you’ll never be short on an incredible view.

Dining onboard is an absolute pleasure – from the elegant, sophisticated cuisine in the main dining room, to the first ever dry-aged steaks at sea at Chops Grille – you’ll never be short on flavour. You can even enjoy fresh, handmade sushi, sashimi and more at the Japanese venue Izumi, or if you fancy something lighter to eat you can always head to one of the many cafes onboard.

Get ready to be entertained – when the sun goes down, the nights heat up with Broadway-style shows, amazing acrobatic performances and even movies under the stars. Chance your luck at the onboard Casino or enjoy your favourite tipple at one of the many bars and lounges. There’s even an English pub where you can settle in for a couple of pints of real ale, or keep the party going into the early hours at the lively onboard nightclub!

What’s included?

  • Full Board – excluding speciality restaurants
  • All entertainment
  • Return flights from London Heathrow

Itinerary

Day 1 – Barcelona, Spain, depart 5.00pm

Day 2 – Cannes/Monte Carlo, France, arrive 8.00am depart 5.00pm

Day 3 – Florence/Pisa, La Spezia, arrive 7.00am depart 7.00pm

Day 4 – Rome, Civitavecchia, Italy arrive 7.00am depart 7.00pm

Day 5 – Ajaccio, Corsica, arrive 8.00am depart 5.00pm

Day 6 – at sea

Day 7 – Palma De Mallorca, Spain, arrive 8am

Day 8 – Palma De Mallorca, Spain, depart 5pm

Day 8 – Barcelona, Spain, arrive 7.00am

Itinerary Highlights

Cannes/Monte Carlo, France

As you bask in the sun of the French Riviera, you’ll soon notice Cannes come alive with glamour and exclusivity – from private beaches to the marinas filled with luxury yachts, this location will leave you feeling like you’ve just stepped onto the set of an attractive film set. Browse through the narrow alleyways and even take a look at the Forville food market. Make sure to grab a spot to eat – take a seat in one of the restaurants offering spectacular views, surrounding you by leafy palm trees too.

Florence/Pisa, La Spezia

Known as the birthplace of Renaissance, Florence has so much culture to offer you. Feast on world-class art and soak up the romantic feel of this bustling city as you gaze out to the Arno river. The narrow streets evoke a thousand tales, and the food and wine are so exquisite that ‘Fiorentina’ has become an international label of quality. Stroll around the designer boutiques – after all, fashion designers Gucci and Roberto Cavallli were born here, so don’t feel bad about treating yourself to a thing or two.

Additional Information

  • Black Friday deals must be booked between 25th – 28th November 2016
  • Plus, pay a reduced deposit of only £25pp
  • Alternative regional flights are available at a supplement
  • Ask our cruise experts for further info on shore excursions, speciality dining and spa treatments – give us a call on 0800 107 1590

Black Friday Offers from Royal Caribbean

For more information on what amazing deals Royal Caribbean are offering this Black Friday, click the button below.

Royal Caribbean Black Friday Offers
